elements.title: V2G uk trial
elements.description: geo are leading a BEIS funded consortium  that’s enabling domestic demand-side-response through our Hybrid Home in 24 UK homes.

elements.title: Vehicle-to-grid: Where’s the smart money?
elements.description: a comprehensive overview of V2G and V1G technologies and regulations. before regulatory changes come into effect, much of the potential value is from behind-the-meter optimisation

elements.title: Dreev
elements.description: V2G platform. Dreev solution relies on Nuvve technology that has already been deployed and validated on 5 continents. Dreev is a creation of both San Diego based [Nuvve](https://nuvve.com/) and EDF Pulse Expansion.

elements.title: EV energy
elements.description: Our smart platform manages EV charging, automatically optimizing for a greener, cheaper charge.
